name: Disgraced Sentinel
resistance: necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Corrupted Angelic Weapons
traits.desc: The sentinel's weapons are magical. When the sentinel hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 3d8 necrotic damage (included in the attack).

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The sentinel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sentinel makes two longbow attacks.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Retreating Shot (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: The sentinel leaps back 50 feet without provoking attacks of opportunity, then makes two shots against a single target with its longbow. The first of these attacks is made with advantage.

actions.name: Decaying Touch (3/Day)
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (6d8 + 3) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Crash of Arrows (1/Day)
actions.desc: The sentinel creates a 30 foot diameter runic circle centered on a location it can see within 120 feet. Whenever a creature enters this area for the first time on a turn or ends its turn in this area, conjured arrows rain down upon them. That creature must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 32 (7d8) piercing damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.
